languages.text: "Когда настанет день, в который мы откажемся лезть в самые темные места и искать самые жуткие знамения... Я пойму, что душа моя направилась к Великому".
"The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."
languages.original_text: "Когда настанет день, в который мы откажемся лезть в самые темные места и искать самые жуткие знамения... Я пойму, что душа моя направилась к Великому".

traits.locale_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."
"The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

"The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

languages.text: « Le jour où nous résisterons à l'envie d'aller chercher des présages pour le moins sinistres au fin fond d'un trou lugubre... je saurai alors que mon âme est partie rejoindre l'Exalté. »
languages.original_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: « Le jour où nous résisterons à l'envie d'aller chercher des présages pour le moins sinistres au fin fond d'un trou lugubre... je saurai alors que mon âme est partie rejoindre l'Exalté. »

languages.text: «Llegará el día en que no aprovechemos la mínima ocasión para meternos en agujeros infectos en busca de presagios macabros... probablemente cuando llegue nuestro encuentro con el Exaltado».
languages.original_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: «Llegará el día en que no aprovechemos la mínima ocasión para meternos en agujeros infectos en busca de presagios macabros... probablemente cuando llegue nuestro encuentro con el Exaltado».

languages.text: 「暗い穴の中に潜って、どうしても恐ろしい予感を探りたくなる日が来る…その時は、アタシの魂がエグザルテッド・ワンに会いに行くときだね」
languages.original_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: 「暗い穴の中に潜って、どうしても恐ろしい予感を探りたくなる日が来る…その時は、アタシの魂がエグザルテッド・ワンに会いに行くときだね」

languages.text: “总有一天，我们会克制住自己的冲动，不再钻到阴暗的洞穴里，不去寻找那些可怕的预兆……到了那个时候我就明白，我的灵魂该去见至高无上的神皇了。”
languages.original_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天，我们会克制住自己的冲动，不再钻到阴暗的洞穴里，不去寻找那些可怕的预兆……到了那个时候我就明白，我的灵魂该去见至高无上的神皇了。”

languages.text: "Der Tag wird kommen, wenn wir dem Drang widerstehen, auf der Suche nach den übelsten Omen in die dunkelsten Löcher zu kriechen ... und dann werde ich wissen, dass meine Seele zum Erhabenen aufgebrochen ist."
languages.original_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: "Der Tag wird kommen, wenn wir dem Drang widerstehen, auf der Suche nach den übelsten Omen in die dunkelsten Löcher zu kriechen ... und dann werde ich wissen, dass meine Seele zum Erhabenen aufgebrochen ist."

languages.text: "En fena alametleri zifirî karanlıkta sürünerek arama arzumuza karşı çıkacağımız bir gün elbet gelecek... İşte o vakit ruhumun Görkemli'ye kavuştuğunu bileceğim."
languages.original_text: "The day will come when we will resist the urge to crawl into the darkest holes looking for the grisliest omens... and I will know then that my soul has gone to meet the Exalted One."
